net.sf.hajdbc.cache

Class DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.hajdbc.cache.DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseMetaDataSupport

    public class DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl
extends Object
implements DatabaseMetaDataSupport
    Processes database meta data into useful structures.
    Author:
    Paul Ferraro

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatabaseMetaDataSupportImpl(DatabaseMetaData metaData, Dialect dialect)
      Constructs a new DatabaseMetaDataSupport using the specified DatabaseMetaData implementation.
